question.text:
What is the function of paragraph 3 ?
A to challenge the notion that Caffè Nero has cut down on all the extras for its employees
B to make clear why Caffè Nero needed to cut down on all the extras for its employees
C to question the rationale behind Caffè Nero's decision to cut down on all the extras for its employees
D to stress that Caffè Nero has unilaterally decided to cut down on all the extras for its employees
